summary: I HAVE A 2008 BMW 535XI THAT CONTINUES TO SHOW "TRANSMISSION MALFUNCTION" WARNING INDICATOR.  I HAVE REPLACED THE BATTERY AND THE STARTER AND HAVE BEEN TOLD THE ALTERNATOR IS FINE.  I HAVE ALSO REPLACED A FUEL INJECTOR THAT WAS LOCKED IN THE OPEN POSITION.  THE CAR ACCELERATES WHEN THE WARNING INDICATOR COMES ON IF THE CRUISE CONTROL IS ON!  I FEAR FOR MY LIFE! THE SPEEDOMETER AND TACHOMETER JUMP BETWEEN YOUR DRIVING SPEED AND ZERO.  THIS IS SO UNSAFE AND I THINK BMW SHOULD RECALL THIS CAR!
